short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A chrome extention to keep track of important dates you are looking forward to.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
I was looking for a nice, easy way to keep track of how old my pets are, nothing fancy, but I couldn't find one I liked, so I made one myself.

Countdown is a little popup window that lets you create both counts down to birthdays (and shows you their age) As well as counting down to a one time event.

This is the first project I have uploaded, so there may be some errors
